name: Sprout Garden
description:
you want to grow a garden.

a meditative bitsy experiment, made on a cold sunday afternoon.

this was a project that blossomed from Weekly Game Jam - Week 97 and its theme: "Strange Garden". although it has long since passed, i wanted to rekindle the ideas it sparked for this year's Jamuary! Second Chances!

remember that you're always growing, and always blooming. xx
